summary: Interact with the Perplexity API to generate AI responses with citations.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Determines the type of resource to interact with (e.g., 'Chat' or 'Custom API Call').

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Specifies the operation to perform (e.g., 'Message a Model' or 'Custom API Call').

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The model which will generate the completion.

parameters.name: messages
parameters.description: Defines the messages to be sent, alternating between user and assistant messages.

parameters.name: simplify
parameters.description: Determines whether to return only essential fields in the output.
